analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā āsavavippayutto anāsavo kusalo
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam na anāsavam na kusalam dhammam paccayā āsava vippayuttaḥ anāsavaḥ kusalo

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā āsava vippayuttam na anāsavam na kusalam dhammam paccayā

original: āsavavippayutto sāsavo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: āsava vippayuttaḥ sa āsavaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā āsavavippayutto sāsavo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam na anāsavam na akusalam dhammam paccayā āsava vippayuttaḥ sa āsavaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam na sa āsavam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ sa āsavaḥ abyākataḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā āsava vippayuttam na anāsavam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca

original: āsavavippayutto sāsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: āsava vippayuttaḥ sa āsavaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā
dve adhipatiyā dve pe a vigate dve
